hero.title: Transforming governance through technology
hero.description: AfricTivistes is a pan-African network that promotes a democratic, inclusive and sovereign Africa in the digital age, through innovative technological solutions.

about.title: About AfricTivistes
about.description: Founded in 2015, AfricTivistes is a pan-African network based in Dakar that works for a democratic, inclusive and sovereign Africa in the digital age.

content.paragraph1: At the crossroads of civic innovation and citizen engagement, AfricTivistes has established itself as a key player in democratic transformation on the continent.
content.paragraph2: In a continental context marked by growing governance challenges, the organization deploys structuring projects and initiatives that reflect the maturity of its approach and the relevance of its vision. It promotes participatory democracy, driven by connected, informed citizens who are fully engaged in processes of change.
content.paragraph3: Through its actions, AfricTivistes defends augmented citizenship, where digital technologies become tools for transparency, accountability and social transformation.

about.quote: Resolutely focused on the future, AfricTivistes builds innovative responses to contemporary democratic challenges, mobilizing the continent's vital forces to build a more just, free and digital Africa.

projects.title: Our Projects
projects.description: Discover our innovative initiatives that align with our strategic axes to strengthen democracy, transparency and citizen engagement in Africa in the digital age.

impact.title: Our Impact
impact.description: Since 2015, AfricTivistes has been transforming governance in Africa through innovative technological initiatives that support a democratic, inclusive and sovereign Africa.

conference.title: West Africa CivicTech Conference 2025
conference.description: Join us in Lagos, Nigeria, from May 19-21, 2025 for the largest conference on civic innovation and democratic technology in West Africa.

partnership.title: Partnership Announcement
partnership.description: We are delighted to announce our official partnership with CivicHive for the West Africa 2025 Civic Tech Conference as a Francophone Advocacy Partner! The conference aims to break down language and digital barriers, and strengthen #CivicTech innovation across West Africa, in order to promote democracy and build more just and inclusive societies.
